about_the_game:
Developed using Unreal Engine, 'Not The North Pole' takes place in a magical, wintery landscape filled with candy, monsters, and toys. 'Not The North Pole' captures the wonder of Christmas with a twist; users play as Mecha Santa and battle evil Christmas spirits such as nutcrackers and snowmen using whimsical weapons that launch candy, ornaments, and other festive oddities.

'Not The North Pole' immerses players in a captivating virtual reality experience with two distinct game modes. In 'Survival Mode', prepare for endless excitement as you face relentless waves of enemies. Collect evil Christmas souls, upgrade your ammo, play with toys that have special abilities (wind up a nutcracker that helps protect you!), but whatever you do... Don't break the fence.

In 'Storybook Mode' (currently in development), select a unique storybook from within Santa's workshop and enjoy an interactive storytelling journey. As the story unfolds, the virtual reality environment transforms around you. Choose the optional 'Read To Me' feature for narration or disable it to read at your own pace. Storybook mode offers a diverse selection of Christmas lore from traditional stories around the world. Experience stories such as:

1. 'Hans Trapp's Haunting', a story where you travel to France to uncover the truth behind the sinister figure of Hans Trapp, who is terrorizing the local children, and put an end to his haunting.

2. The Belsnickel's Challenge: Santa flies to Germany and faces off against Belsnickel, a mischievous figure who wants to take over Christmas in Germany. Belsnickel challenges Santa to a series of trials that test his wits, agility, and kindness. Players must overcome these challenges and restore the holiday spirit.

*'Not The North Pole' is still in active development and some features such as 'Storybook Mode' are not yet available.*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Oculus Touch/Valve Index Controllers or better
  • Additional Notes: Please contact OmniReality for additional controller support.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Oculus Touch/Valve Index Controllers or better
  • Additional Notes: Please contact OmniReality for additional controller support.

short_description: "Not The North Pole" is a magical VR game where players become Santa in a wintery world, battling festive foes. Enjoy strategic round-based gameplay fighting off snowmen, nutcrackers, and more. Customize your Mecha Santa robot and embark on enchanting adventures for all ages!
